name: Genius (Victor Ribeiro)
description:
In Brasil this game was known as Genius, in America Simon. No matter the name, the goal is simple: follow the sequence.

This version of this popular game has several feed back to help the player go as long as possible. Arrows, touch, click, numbers, letters... They all work as inputs, also there's sound for people who memorize sound better than color or numbers or letters.
